titleInfo.title: Letter, W.L. Headrick in Greeneville, Tenn. to O.P.Temple in Knoxville, Tenn., 1865 May 17

mods.abstract: 1865 May 17 W.L. Headrick, Greeneville,Tenn. to O.P. Temple. Will Temple represent him in suit brought in Chancery by D.L. Rogers for sale of negro girl after Act of 1862 freeing slaves.
